servinfo.title: Oil Pump, Oil Pump Chain and Gasket Holder Plate Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Oil Pump, Oil Pump Chain and Gasket Holder Plate Removal and Installation:F9Q

servinfosub.title: Oil Pump
servinfosub.ptxt: Check teeth of oil pump sprocket for wear or damage.
If any malcondition is found, replace oil pump assembly.

servinfosub.title: Oil Pump Drive Sprocket
servinfosub.ptxt: Check teeth of oil pump drive sprocket for wear or damage.
If any malcondition is found, replace oil pump drive sprocket.

servinfosub.title: Oil Pump Chain
servinfosub.ptxt: Check oil pump chain for wear or damage.
If any malcondition is found, replace oil pump chain.

servinfosub.title: Gasket Holder Plate
servinfosub.ptxt: Check gasket holder plate (1) and oil pump chain guide (2) for wear or damage.
If any malcondition is found, replace gasket holder and/or oil pump chain guide.
